DIA_Limak_FIRSTWARN_03_01: I guess you're not one of the guests. Where are you going?
DIA_Limak_SECONDWARN_03_01: Whoa, whoa! One more step and you'll regret it!
DIA_Limak_SQ413_Roderich_Description: Roderich himself ordered me to inspect this building!
DIA_Limak_SQ413_Roderich_15_01: Roderich himself ordered me to inspect this building! You want to obstruct the guards' investigation?
DIA_Limak_SQ413_Roderich_03_02: Me? No way... I just... If Roderich himself ordered it, then of course, you can come in.
DIA_Limak_SQ413_Lorenzo_Description: I have a very important package that Lorenzo ordered me to deliver.
DIA_Limak_SQ413_Lorenzo_15_01: I have a very important package that Lorenzo ordered me to deliver. It must go directly to the recipient's room. You want the Guild to be delayed because of you?
DIA_Limak_SQ413_Lorenzo_03_02: No, of course not... it's just... it's not exactly in keeping with our rules... You can of course wait here for the person you're supposed to deliver to.
